definition[0]: to connect a piece of electrical equipment to the main supply of electricity, or to another piece of electrical equipment
example[0]: ‘Is your printer working?’ ‘Wait a minute – it’s not plugged in.’
definition[1]: able to be connected to the electricity supply, or to another piece of electrical equipment
definition[2]: a piece of computer software that can be used in addition to existing software in order to make particular programs work properly
definition[3]: a piece of software that can be used in addition to existing software in order to make particular programs work properly
